website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable brace that won't work for everyone but is a good choice for those who need minimal to moderate support.
pros: Lightweight brace with mesh panels that make it breathable and comfortable to wear under clothes
cons: Size inconsistencies - complaints of it fitting too small and too large
Support is not significant enough for all wearers

customer_reviews.title: When you young you feel like Superman , trust me protect your back from early live long live well
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 different back brace in 2 years but this one is perfect it’s light weight you don’t even realize it on you . Feel good don’t leave a residual strain on your brace when you finish using it .I use this on work I am a floor installer/sander and refinisher and I am always lifting , moving box of floor , furniture and appliances
customer_reviews.author: Solomon D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent tool to allow me to stay active
customer_reviews.text: I have two ruptured discs (L4-L5) and play recreational tennis. I already have things like a tens unit, inversion table, etc which help in short spurts but this brace allowed me to play a 3 hour high intensity singles match. It protected me from any further injury and allows me to continue playing the sport I love. Great value. I have not yet attempted to launder it, but it seems very well made and is extremely comfortable. I’m 6’ 2” and just under 300 lbs and the XXL fits me perfectly. I highly recommend for anyone working to prevent lower back injury and continue to stay active.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Elastic on rear of brace ripped after 1st use. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: embert

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not of good quality. Threads are coming out after using it for 10 days. I was not expecting this because the ratings and reviews here at Amazon for this item are really good. Now I am thinking that buying it was a bad idea and waste of time, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit

customer_reviews.title: I could see it helping if you were standing like maybe at a cash register all day and pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Made bending, sitting, moving too difficult. It dug into my stomach to much to be active in. I could see it helping if you were standing like maybe at a cash register all day and pretty much standing in place not doing a lot of movement. But that's not what I needed it for so it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: e. blue

customer_reviews.title: Never thought a wrap around belt would improve mobility like it did
customer_reviews.text: Never thought a wrap around belt would improve mobility like it did. This belt allowed me to go to work and be functional enough to get through a very bad lumbar spasm and bulging disc. I am a huge skeptic when it comes to these kind of things. A Dr. friend of mine told me about them and to get one so I looked on Amazon and this one had high marks and at a affordable price and it is quite amazing what it did for my back until I improved on my own. I recommend it highly for anyone with low back problems!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Fits a larger waist and does help prevent back pain to an extent.
customer_reviews.text: I have a large waist (47') and this fit's perfectly! I was worried it would roll up and it doesn't! It does push the whole thing up a bit when you sit down, but it still sits on your back. My back hurts after leaning forward to long (like when working on the sewing machine which I have been doing lately) and this helps it.. it doesn't cure it, but it helps. I can go an hour without much pain now, not great, but better than before!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Calderhead

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I'd Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: This brace is better than I’d hoped for. I got it as a ‘kidney brace’ for motorcycle riding and after taking a short spin, I find it is exactly what I wished for on my stiffly suspended bike. The key is the double belt. The first belt goes around you like a conventional belt – which I had but lost somewhere. However, then you unhook an outer belt and finely adjust the tension on your back using that. It’s the outer belt which puts this brace above any similar device I’ve seen. The instructions explain things perfectly. Somebody got clever here and I’m benefiting. I truly like this belt much more than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cassel

customer_reviews.title: poor performance for the item I received
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product and get some back relief. The adjustable straps do not appear to serve any purpose because the velcro closure keeps everything tight. This item only seems to squeeze my abdomen and pushes against my waistline pants/shorts; which makes the wearing of this item uncomfortable. It may work for some, just not for me. I spent $20+ to try the item and will not use it again. Mike
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long periods of sitting, and fits on smaller humans!
customer_reviews.text: I spend about 80 hours a week sitting down doing school related things, whether it's a lecture or an all-nighter. Paired up with mild scoliosis and years of horrible posture, I figured it was time I invested in something like this. I absolutely love it! After my last "hardcore" study session, I found myself laying flat on the floor because of how bad my back felt. Now if I have to sit for 10 consecutive hours, I pop on this back brace and feel just fine after I'm done. For sizing ref: I'm 4'10" and about 95 lbs. The S/M size fits perfectly on me.
customer_reviews.author: Maribelle Mart'nez

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: I strained a muscle in my back and was in trouble. Couldn't get up and down. Icing, hot pads and stretching wasn't quite doing it. Got one of these, put it on for an hour or so a few times a day (along with all of the other stuff) and feel so much better. I would highly, highly recommend this product. Don't leave it on all of the time though. It's a compression device so you need to go back and forth and use it in conjunction with other therapies.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you have a sensitive abdominal area/stomach problems
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this brace as it does support my back/lessens pain. (I have fibromyalgia with lower back pain that's aggravated by excessive activity so I got this for work as I'm on my feet and bending over a lot) however, as one reviewer said, there's no elastic on the back part of the brace, only the front, so it puts a lot of pressure on my stomach and gives me nausea/stomach pain. I have a sensitive stomach so it could just be a personal issue. It is very well made. I want to hopefully find a way to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lise Wonderland

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Velcro does not hold at all and comes loose in a few minutes. It is useless.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and helps with my lower back. Wish that the main band was also elastic to connect the two piece together and easier
customer_reviews.text: It is very helpful for my lower back. I do have to say that when I first put it on, it was a bit hard to get as tight as I liked. The first band you secure together is not elastic and it's why I can't get it to be as tight as I like. I was able to put it on and get the elastic bands to make it tighter. Otherwise, after using the brace for a bit longer than a week or two, I am happy to say it helps to keep my back from giving out.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn U.

customer_reviews.title: Product as described/shown here. I sit at a desk ...
customer_reviews.text: Product as described/shown here. I sit at a desk all day, so this prevents me from slouching and hurting my lower back. It can get uncomfortable after 3-4 hours though, understandably. I also sometimes use it to do squats at the gym and it really helped with my form, especially because my core is not as strong. d Overall, solid product.
customer_reviews.author: zentriton

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Is Incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I have a 40" waist, which is right in the middle of the quoted size range for the 'L/XL" version of this product. However, it only fits me when I have nothing on but underwear. Put on a pair of pants with a belt and it will not close. Now, when it is in place it is nice and supportive but I can't wear it with normal clothes on and don't want to wear it under my clothes. Fortunately another family member can use it, I had to order a 2XL which should not have been necessary if their sizing was correct. Well-made in other respects, which is why I was willing to try the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Gorham

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this more for my two hernias and not so much the back. I wasn't disappointed. Incredibly versatile in its build and adjustability. It really worked perfectly for the support I needed in front and back. Very comfortable and breathes very nice too. It has multiple areas of adjustment so just about anyone can get it to fit their build, I would hope. Really, the cost to me was below the value of this belt. I highly recommend it for a product that doesn't let you down on every level for what I needed. It is also very easy to clean if you sweat in it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B. Cicco

customer_reviews.title: This brace does a great job of supporting that area
customer_reviews.text: I've had several spine problems in my cervical, thoracic, and lumbar spine. All of them have protruding discs, but my most problematic area is the T8-T9 spine. This brace does a great job of supporting that area! I used it to sit in an uncomfortable chair at work after I couldn't handle the pain anymore and it worked great. When I can back into lifting weights, i'm going to make sure I wear this thing all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Sisko

customer_reviews.title: Great stabilizing holder for a back!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lumbar back holder is a fantastic. It was advised by physiotherapist. It’s useful thing, in period when you have slower back pain; it reduces pain in lumbar position.
customer_reviews.author: Prime0711

customer_reviews.title: The relief I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back and with only essential surgeries able to be taking place I needed something to help support my back and alleviate the pain. I get good support, its comfortable and gets me through the day when my back acts up. I have another one of these types of braces and its far too uncomfortable compared to this one. Pain relief can only be so much really but it does its best with what it has to work with. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Vymetal

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Although there are probably better ones out there with a little more support, but this thing is awesome! I have about a 40 waist when I'm not working out (when I'm fat:), and the xl fits fine. I feel like a million bucks! I have lower back pain, and then I put this thing on, and then I don't have back pain?!? It's nuts! Why on Earth did I not buy this sooner! I am a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Relief from back pain
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, in that my back pain is gone. It took weeks before my back felt better. I had to wear it when walking for my exercise or standing while preparing dinner that needed a longer preparation. Although I felt there might be better back supports out there, probably more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A.

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I think the photo of a chap with a six pack using this says a lot about the product: it’s probably not for you or I. Who it is for I don’t know as it has very little support and certainly won’t help with a back injury or even back ache. Straws from McDonald’s might have more rigidity than the plastic spines in this. It may prove useful as a gut buster under a suit jacket or for posing in the gym with said six pack, but I suspect there are better options for that too. A useless buy.
customer_reviews.author: BluesViews

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS and Is Comfortable to Boot!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has bought many "braces" for your back, but I have never liked any of them as they are too uncomfortable......until he bought me BraceUP! I use it in the kitchen all the time since that is where I spend lots of my time. My back can start bothering me quicker these days, my now I have no problems standing while chopping, slicing, baking, frying, washing, etc....you get the idea! I LOVE this brace. I can wear it under my shirts/tops too, and no one notices!! How cool is that? Seriously though, I would recommend this to anyone with back problems or to anyone who doesn't have them yet. Just so much support for your back.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: size small
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I left my brace somewhere and immediately ordered another one. Supposedly it is the same one, but this is clearly wider than the other, which is fine with me. It is somewhat stiffer, as well, but that could be because it is new. I'm happy with it, hence, I ordered the same one. It gives a fair amount of support. For me, I have a challenge with my posture so of need to remind myself to keep my shoulders back. I would like a brace that incorporated the shoulders. This one does not. All in all, it accomplishes what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Well made product, but not for me unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Product does work very well... I have three herniations in my lower back L4-l5 and S1 are the worst... bad sciatic pain in left leg. Also degenerative disc disease. When my leg hurts so I can put this on and within a half an hour it does subside the pain in my leg, unfortunately the neurosurgeon I just saw told me not to wear the brace as it weakens the muscles in the back over time, so unfortunately I will not be able to continue using it. However for somebodyLooking for pain relief, it certainly did the job for me and seems like a sturdy product. Really wish my dr would let me wear it Lol.
customer_reviews.author: jason orrick

customer_reviews.title: Sciatic and leg pain significantly reduced with this back brace!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and returned another brace that wrapped around my leg and lower back. I didn’t have much hope for this brace, but the reviews convinced me to give it a try. I have bulging discs on every L vertebrae and severe spinal stenosis. I am in pain all the time except for sitting and sleeping. Within 30 min of putting this brace on, my back pain is reduced by 80%. My pain shoots down my right leg all the way to my right calf. My leg pain was even reduced significantly! This brace was a miracle purchase for me. I can stand and walk now with reduced pain. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: BEST back support!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for my son, who has lumbar problems and has to stand at work. He really loves how the brace helps him get through the night with a lot less pain! I then bought one for me after I hurt my back. It definitely is a godsend! I highly recommend this product for comfort, ease of use, effectiveness, and affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: SWM seeks supportive SLLBB
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, can even go under shirts without it being too obvious. I am trying to avoid future lower back issues like another spasm or slipped disc so I wear it often, even around the house doing chores or even watching television. If it were human, we could have had something beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jesseonthebrink

customer_reviews.title: Got me through my lower back muscle strain
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to alleviate lower back pain following a muscle strain I had. I was able to wear it under my clothes on a couple bad days and this brace enabled me to get through the work day. I would not recommend constantly wearing it if it's not necessary as it feels like you could easily become dependent on it and slow the healing process. Probably best to ask a doctor if you find yourself relying too heavily on it.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Stabilizing Belt
customer_reviews.text: Great adjustment features with the two additional side Velcro straps. Excellent compression retention and proper belt width enhance the performance. My wife wanted one after I received mine. Recommendation: if in doubt, buy the next larger size. I am 38" - 40" waist and bought the XXL.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Eppes

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this brace. It is flexible enough to do weight lifting and long runs in and sturdy enough to use when helping people move. It has not cured my pain, but it has without a doubt allowed to perform much better when having a bad day with my back. I love everything about this brace. I am 6ft 5in and 250lbs. If it supports me it will support most people. I do extensive exercise (90 minutes-120 minutes) 5 days a week and use this brace for every one of them even when my back is feeling fine. Allows me to workout and exercise even when my back hurts without causing it to hurt more.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schwartz

customer_reviews.text: I have had surgery on my lower back already, but have another herniated disc further up my spine and never really healed from my surgery, so I've looked into a few different solutions for quite some time now. I’m also a heavy lifter (explains the back problems to being with). With all of that being said, this has been on of the best purchases I’ve ever made. I feel much more comfortable doing activities that used to worry me, such as, bending, sitting for long periods of time, certain forms/motions at the gym, etc. honestly highly recommend this to anyone whether you have bad back pain or not just for that extra support.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Feels good to wear but not much support
customer_reviews.text: Do you know what they say if it takes the pain away that it can’t be that comfortable and this one holds true to form as it doesn’t really do a great job of getting rid of my back pain but it’s relatively comfortable to wear. The fit and finish is nice there’s just no support on the backside of the brace so it’s like wearing a largeBandage around your waist. I purchased another back brace made a little bit stronger with back support for my back and this one has ended up in the closet
customer_reviews.author: Joe .m

customer_reviews.title: comfort and funtion both
customer_reviews.text: I wear this against my bare skin with no issues at all. Very comfortable and stabilizes my back. Had lower back pain after taking up pickle ball, but it is pretty much gone now. I wear it during the day and sometimes while sleeping with no irritation or problem. First back brace I have ever worn ( I'm 69 ), have had it only a couple of weeks, but I like it. Have not tried to play pickle again but wearing this, may try soon, just to see. I wear it cycling and when on an elliptical as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these I have purchased for my son who is paralyzed from waist down and uses this for trunk support playing wheelchair basketball. 1st was great, lasted a full season. This 2nd one was falling apart after less than 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Todd deyo

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the much more expensive S.P.I.N.E. brace that has a rigid plastic plate in the small of your back, but better than nothing for heavy lifting. You can adjust the amount of support which is very useful, as the tighter positions are uncomfortable and only needed during the lifting. This allows the user to release tension and wear the belt comfortably until next needed when it can be tightened up.
customer_reviews.author: Fozwort

customer_reviews.title: Great Relief from Sciatica Pain
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight but very supportive. Good strong closure. I wear it under my clothes and no one knows I have it on. I have a bulging disc causing sciatica pain. This is such a relief.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to put on, support without restriction
customer_reviews.text: I wear this brace for housework and yard work - basically whenever I know I'm going to stress my back. This brace is not as binding and restrictive as some, but it gives me enough support to stabilize my back and minimize the pain. A great product that doesn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

customer_reviews.title: It is so comfortable, easy to wear and use
customer_reviews.text: I was starting to have back problems. I clean my horse stalls everyday, lift buckets of water out to empty and clean, and this was beginning to take a toll on me - UNTIL a friend suggested I try a back brace. So, onto Amazon I went and found this back brace. It is so comfortable, easy to wear and use, I love it. I put it on when I am about to do anything where my back would become involved and it has helped me 95% with the back problems I was starting to have. Thank you so much. Wendy :)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good compression back brace ... but
customer_reviews.text: I had major lumbar decompression and fusion surgery and was given an Aspen PRO brace during convalescence. I bought the BraceUP as a lighter weight, less constrictive spare brace. I think it is good quality and less constrictive (can be work for golf or pickleball), but it is no match for the support afforded by the Aspen, which is a much robust and stiffer design. If you want to see if a brace could reduce your back pain, start with the Aspen.
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: Better than copperfit
customer_reviews.text: This back brace has got me through so many agonizing days. Do you understand I wouldn't be able to make money if it wasn't for this thing. It has also corrected my back somewhat. I love that you can double adjust the straps. I am pain free in my back due to this and taking the box spring off my bed.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: it works very well 230 pounds 5 foot 9 1/2 I got the extra extra large perfect. The only thing I could say is maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: The belt came reasonably quick, it works very well 230 pounds 5 foot 9 1/2 I got the extra extra large perfect. The only thing I could say is maybe the bars could be a little firmer the bars that go in the back for the support other than that this boat works great ,Although if they were a little firmer than you might not be able to move as well I give it five stars because it does what it’s supposed to do. I fractured my l1 lumbar,And it’s working great feeling better every day would recommend
customer_reviews.author: aceman

customer_reviews.title: Needed pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who has a mild case of scoliosis. She felt instant relief. It helps her sit straighter with less pressure on her back. As well as give her support to be able to stand and walk without the same pain and discomfort she felt without it. My second daughter fell injuring her back so i just placed a second order. Thx
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't worth the money that I spent on it. Be cautious and spend a bit more money on a more quality product. I go walking everyday and my back ached horribly so I got this BraceUp which didnt help. I'll be investing in something else that will grant better results. I'm returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Arneisha

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. It is well made and holds in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It is well made and holds in place all day long. Other supports I have tried the Velcro wore out and the support would no longer stay in place, especially in active situations. This is not the case with this product. It has held fast every day and night for over a month now with no loosening at all. I especially like the idea of being able to place more tension in certain other parts of the back and sides with the secondary belts. It is comfortable to wear all day, not hot and sweaty like some others. I would highly recommend this to anyone who suffers from back problems and needs a comfortable support.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Wasted effort....
customer_reviews.text: The company selling these braces should be ashamed. I ordered the 38"-50" size and it is way to small. My waist measures 38" with a measuring tape. This thing does not even wrap completely around my waist. I can't rate the quality or how well it works because it doesn't fit. Shame on Amazon for allowing a company to sell on their site and deceive customers and waste their time.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C.

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable I couldn't use it.
customer_reviews.text: I imagine this is quite well made, but it is so uncomfortable and cumbersome that I couldn't even wear it around the house. I tried it under clothes, over clothes, looser, everything I could think of, and had to give up. I'd like to know just who does wear something like this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MayryChatt

customer_reviews.title: Replacement of lost back support
customer_reviews.text: Got this a replacement for a lower back support I forgot in a rental car. The previous brand isn't available, got this one. It's ok but definitely doesn't measure up to the previous one. I don't like the scratchy itchy rather rigid fabric. Also it doesn't fit on my body as well as the previous did. Kept it to have something when need the support.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay for the price, product finish is not good
customer_reviews.author: Arjun

customer_reviews.title: Good for a portion of the day on some days
customer_reviews.text: This has worked quite well so far. It is especially helpful when I am standing --working in the kitchen, walking around the house, using the computer in a stand-up position. However, when I sit down it rides up and becomes uncomfortable. Haven't had it long enough to require washing so can't comment on that. Have not worn it outside the house because wearing it while sitting in the car would not be comfortable or offer the stabilization where I need it. In short, it's good for a portion of my day on most days but it isn't a total solution to back support.
customer_reviews.author: easyrv

customer_reviews.title: Best back brace I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable and pain relieving back brace I have ever had. I have worn others and they were so-so. This was great when I first put it on. I wore it all day and hardly knew it was there. I will buy another one if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Webster

customer_reviews.title: Relief of back pain from working out
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think that I'd be 33 wearing a back brace. Yet, here I am. I was working out doing Romanian deadlift's and had to stop while working out. For a week straight my lower right side of my back was in such pain. Finally, I thought it was time to buy one of these "back braces" just got it and have been wearing it for two days, it is comfortable and my back pain is slowly decreasing. I give this brace two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for me
customer_reviews.text: My review may be irrelevant for most users and a little embarrassing for me to admit. I have had lots of kids, including one when I was 41. So I have a bigger tummy than most. It would not fit around my body without looking ridiculous. I wear an XL in everything so I didn’t think it was an issue. I didn’t give it a bad review but I just wanted women to know.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Robertson

customer_reviews.title: If in doubt, choose smaller size.
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable for daily use but if you need a lot of support, I'd go with a different option. If medium to low support is needed, this is a great option. Unfortunately when I purchased there were not any small/mediums in stock but the large said it would fit for my size, 34" waist, and was just too big to get much support. Feels like a quality product for the price but just isn't working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Pan

customer_reviews.title: I like it!  Also: it's well made and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever back brace and I like it. I bought it because I recently injured my back. Since I've never tried any other models, I can't compare it to anything, but when I wear it (quite low, touching my hips) I do feel strain relief on my back. Also, VERY importantly, I have worn this unit under my shirt (i.e. directly on my skin), and there has been no discomfort at all! Also, the stretchy strap things make getting the tightness of it super easy. I'd say for the $20 it costs, you can't lose.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: It's working for me. I had a back issue ...
customer_reviews.text: It's working for me. I had a back issue and I wear this over my pjs and robe when I first get up in the morning. After feeding the cats, straining the litter, and getting lunch ready(all while wearing the brace), I am ready for my morning ablutions and stretching exercises. Then, I no longer need the brace and I'm ready to go to the office.
customer_reviews.author: maw1947

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I sprained a muscle in my side while using a cane to avoid putting too much pressure on a broken leg. I needed to continue to walk with the cane but it was very painful. I discovered that if I held my arm tightly against my side as I used the cane it did not hurt quite so much. I purchased this brace to keep pressure against my side and was able to walk almost pain free. It relieved the pain allowing the sprain to heal. So glad I purchased this brace.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Help your back...be kind to it...purchase one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brace as I had to shovel 4 tons of stone one weekend and I needed the support so I would be able to get out of bed the next day...well it did its job! I got it all done and was able to walk the next day! I gave it four stars rather then 5 as the only complaint I have it that it is a tad larger then I had hoped based on the sizing chart... other then that it is a comfortable and seemingly well made brace. I would not hesitate to purchase one if you are looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lower back less than perfect, give this a try!!!
customer_reviews.text: I slipped a couple of disc's a few years ago and my lower back feels "loose" and painful at times, especially when lifting heavy objects. I finally decided to look for something that could help and gave this belt a try. I'm very glad I did as it really does help! It's very comfortable, very adjustable (tightness wise), etc. For $20... there's not much to lose... do ittttt...
customer_reviews.author: jlb - 64086

customer_reviews.title: Lower Back Pain Expert says... "I was hurting for something like this..."  :-)
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today via Prime (1-day delivery). Took off my old belt and put this one on. BTW, I got the Large/XL, and I'm a 36-38 man's waist, and it fit just fine. Definitely not too large. Great support and a very fair price. For anyone who complains that you can't easily sit with this on... they're very correct. That's because this style support belt has vertical stabilizing inserts. Very well made. I extremely satisfied. I wish I'd purchased it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Al in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Poor Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love this brace is easy to use and provides comfort and stability to my lower back. I dislike the delivery person writing that they handed it to a resident. I'm the only resident in my home! I walked out to my mailbox at the end of my driveway and found it shoved inside! Prime delivery has not been good lately. You are farming out delivery to people who are not professional and don’t care about your company’s reputation! Please address this matter.
customer_reviews.author: Tell Tale

customer_reviews.title: I have had two lower back surgeries. After returning ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had two lower back surgeries. After returning to cardio classes at the Y, I could not strengthen by back adequately so I bought this brace. Since I started using it, I have ceased having back pain. The adjustable side panels have worked excellently to give me the extra support that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Vossler

customer_reviews.title: Really helps my sore back when I'm working
customer_reviews.text: I twisted my back at work and it took about 3 weeks to recover from it but I didn't miss any days. I ordered this brace on Fri and got it on Sunday, just in time to use for my job on Monday. It worked great! It really secured the lower back area so I could work with it on without pain. Even though my back is fine now I still wear it everyday to work to prevent another sore back. I couldn't work without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must for CNA's and maybe people that move furniture.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for years now. I still use it. It helps with support and pain. It really forces you to keep good body mechanics. I bought this product because when I get tired body mechanics go out the window. This helps me not hurt my back or give it a rest when it has been overused.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Nunez-Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me!
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect this thing to work as well as it did. At one point, I could barely walk because I was in such pain. I got instant relief the moment I put this thing on. So thankful!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Helped soooo much!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived when promised and the packaging was in perfect condition. I put it on right away, as I had been having lower back pain for days when I ordered, and was hoping for a miracle. Well, I didn't get a miracle, but I did get almost instant semi-relief! The pain didn't disappear completely or immediately, but it did help . . . a lot! Because of the level of pain I was having I found I could, and did, wear it while sleeping! I think that is everything you can realistically ask for with a brace that has this low a price tag.
customer_reviews.author: ltf

customer_reviews.title: Helped me so much!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started having lower back pains and muscle spasms, and i ordered this lower back brace (L). Wasn't sure if it would help, someone else recommended I try it. I can now work without much pain (still haven't tried golfing again), and it gives great relief from anymore spasms and pain. I would highly recommend this product, it has helped me a lot. I ordered the large, I have a 36" belly (not waist). Great product!
customer_reviews.author: rich001

customer_reviews.title: Size is too confusing.
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay for back support, but the size is not described properly... First I ordered large/ X Large it was too large, could not make it tight I had to send it back at my cost of shipping for $6 !! Then I ordered Small/ Medium, Which seems kinda small, but it did fit to my satisfaction, can’t send it back, it’s gonna cost me another $6 even though I’m Prime member, something to consider about!!
customer_reviews.author: kong chang

customer_reviews.title: I like it for everyday use more than the industrial type
customer_reviews.text: I've owned one of these for about a month and it has saved my injured back considerably. I like it for everyday use more than the industrial type, because it comes off and on easily, is adjustable, and is easily hidden beneath a shirt or jacket. I use it when doing anything that has me bent slightly like doing dishes, giving my wife a good night backrub, or cleaning my fish tank. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hargett

customer_reviews.title: Best back brace ever
customer_reviews.text: I've had at least 6 back braces over the last 20 years, for lifting mostly. This is the most comfortable by far! My others were from the big box stores. I found their nylon ribs dug into me and I usually cut them out. But the ribs in this belt are more flexible and comfortable. BTW, I've found a brace extremely helpful for long trips in the car. When you get out at a rest stop, you don't have to work out the kinks from the long drive. (Don't have the belt too tight though.)
customer_reviews.author: R Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great help for keeping back straight and firm
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps me keep my back straight and firm from my work which requires me to lift heavy trays. Can be adjusted 3 times to make it comfortable. One thing I don't like though is not comfortable to wear underneath your shirt, feels to rough and gets too warm when worn for too long and it'll get you sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: BraceUP Brace helped so much.
customer_reviews.text: BraceUP gives amazing support to lumbar area. Having adjustments on each side (after putting brace on) is great. Sometimes I need a bit more tightening and sometimes a bit less. So easy to make adjustments. Brace is especially helpful for me when driving. Size was as described. Brace was delivered when promised. Very pleased with brace and recommend it to those needing a bit of support for the lumbar area.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer minor back pain and just need some quick to use relief this works very well, as we are taking walks more and more these days it is great to have a little support in the back area as sitting on the sofa watching TV tends to make the back a little sore....
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Scott Fan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: I was wearing this sometimes for my an separation but two days ago my husband threw out his back. This has helped enormously!
customer_reviews.author: G Beckstead

customer_reviews.title: excellent for fat guys
customer_reviews.text: im a fat dude. believe me. i ate a 4x4 animal style from in and out in one sitting. let me tell you, this thing fit around me perfectly. helped me out with my bad back. most likely do to them burgers, but hey, now that i got this bad ass back brace, i aint stopping from chowing down!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Use it almost daily
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 bulging disc and scoliosis. I should have a job that requires me to sit but tjat is what I do. This brace is great and helps a few hours into my day. I especially like that I can tighten the straps. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Momma M

customer_reviews.title: Enough bracing for comfort while still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this brace to many I have tried because it provides a moderate amount of bracing while still being comfortable. I don't sweat as much under it as with many I have tried. If you need strong bracing so your back can't move at all, this isn't the brace for you. But it is also more adjustable than many otheer bracces.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty effective!
customer_reviews.text: Started to dig in after too long (I wear this for work), but that was probably just because I was wearing it too tight. While it didn’t do much to relieve my pre-existing pain, it did pretty phenomenally at making sure aforementioned pain didn’t get any worse, which I’ll definitely take.
customer_reviews.author: Margaux

customer_reviews.title: Great, but short life span.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked like a charm for a couple of months. Then as soon as the band starts to lose elasticity it stops working. The product has a short lifespan. Started using it the first week in May and it is completely shot and it’s August 30th.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pipkin

customer_reviews.title: Very Good- better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Needed a back support belt right away. Purchased one from Wal-Mart that cost the same but crippled me for a month. I was unable to walk for a month. The belt strangled a nerves and/or blood vessel in the top of my hip. Causing Damage to the lateral cutaneous and Lateral femoral cutaneous nerve. The Stays in the Wal-Mart belt are to thin and allow the belt to roll up. This belt from Amazon was a 100 times better and didn't roll up. Also the belt fits better. I ordered the same size from both retailers. If you sit for long times this is a good back support belt. Stopped the back pain in a little while.
customer_reviews.author: James M Logan

customer_reviews.title: Graet Back support
customer_reviews.text: The Brace Up Back support is as advertised. I've been very happy with it. I injured my back a few months ago while lifting some weights. Thought I'd try using this back support to help me while working out and it has really helped me a lot. I no longer feel the "after pain" after completing my workout. I feel more confident with the added support that I won't re-injure my back. It fits nicely and I love the adjustable straps which make the fit more individualized. It's the only back support I've ever tried, but I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: emc2guy

customer_reviews.title: I had just had lower back surgery the week before and needed a good support while walking and standing
customer_reviews.text: When looking for a back-brace, there were so many choices. I had just had lower back surgery the week before and needed a good support while walking and standing. The braceUP appealed to me because of the ventilated design and the adjustable panels. Although the BraceUP was one of the least expensive, the quality is superb. I am extremely satisfied by the adjustable design and breathable fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Franktoo

customer_reviews.title: This product does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: I tried 2 different support belts and this one came out on top. The brace fits very well and the support bands make this an excellent product offering. The support it provides yields maximum comfort. I find it useful when I am doing chores around the house and yard and it also keeps my back in proper alignment. The other good thing I like about this product is the optional extra sizes since I am a 2x. The bands do not crunch up when sitting (at least not yet). I'll report back in about 3 months if there's any substantial changes.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Perkins

customer_reviews.title: True to it’s claims
customer_reviews.text: Using it when playing badminton. Helps a lot with my lower back pain. Could have been a bit thinner so it can sit snug under the tshirt. No More back pains. Great quality product. Highly recommend. Thanks FoxPro Sports for yet another awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: and I am satisfied with the BraceUP
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a back brace, and I am satisfied with the BraceUP. I needed support when I do things like house cleaning, gardening, and other activities requiring lots of back movement and stress. Having had several broken bones, I can really have aches when I do lots of things. The BraceUp has given me support and strength where I need it most. I need to learn better to adjust the brace and position it properly, but it is certainly a great help and saves me from pain and strain. I am so happy that I have found this brace. It is a quality, well made back brace.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Bug

customer_reviews.title: Best back brace i have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Used for back support excellent best back brace i have ever bought will order another as a 'backup'
customer_reviews.author: jimmy d locke

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Helped me post operation. Had a micro discectomy. L5S1. Severe herniation. It defunitley took pain away and helped with my posture. It was also less bulky than brace i received from doctor which means it was easier to hide under my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: mark m.

customer_reviews.title: WHY?
customer_reviews.text: Why is it so difficult to find a back brace that settles low enough on one's back? I can't get any of them situated where I actually need them (L1-L4). The product itself is nice, strong, but it just doesn't cut it for me. I truly have LOW back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Loreen Finn

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I deal with lower back pain due to car accident some years back . I needed a brace that would help support my back and stabilize my posture, especially when Im training . This is it. Its lightwieght and very supportive. I sweat A LOT and this braces allows me to breathe . After a few wears , I've noticed about 75% reduction in my back pain. Again i say, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I upgraded to this one. Excellent width and support with added straps and ribs for added support for posture. Excellent Quality. I operate heavy equipment every day, have a strained back, I use it for support, added strength and better posture. Breathable straps are a plus because the equipment can gets warm. Good for cooling. It also recovers after wearing for 8 hrs. No permanent ripples like my other one. I dont take it off till I get home. Thanks, excellent product. You need a TV commercial!! : )
customer_reviews.author: Quality shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So, I have a big tummy but I tried it out anyway I got the XXL and at first I tried it on with the main strap it was a no for me but THEN I noticed there were to other straps and I was GOOD! I really didn't read or look at the photos when I got this item, I just seen it was a back brace and I got it! Great item!
customer_reviews.author: SistaSmurf

customer_reviews.title: Works, but the velcro is scratchy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear, and makes my back feel much better. The only downside is that the exposed velcro is rough, and I end up with scratches on the inside of my arms if I'm not careful while walking around with it on. The obvious way to avoid this issue is to wear a shirt over it...
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rickman

customer_reviews.title: The best back brace ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave five stars for this product because it deserves it. The brace arrived so quick, before even its estimated arrival time. The item was double packed and for that reasons it arrived very safely. The back brace was magical. It gave me an instant relief for my lower back problem. I am size 38 and I ordered XL. It fits perfect. I recommend to wear it above t-shirt or any clothing. Over all it is the best brace.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: If you are less than a 36" waist you should go with the S/M.
customer_reviews.text: If you are less than a 36" waist you should go with the S/M. I'm a 36" to 38" and the "L/XL" size stretches almost to the limits of the belt, and I think if I lose any weight I would have to purchase the next size down (the S/M).
customer_reviews.author: CDW

customer_reviews.title: Review edit
customer_reviews.text: Originally I loved this back belt. However, the stitching started to come undone shortly after I started wearing it everyday, all day. I was unable to get it returned within the time allowed, so missed getting it returned or replaced. I suppose if you only wear a back belt once in awhile it would be okay, but this one does not hold up to a daily, full work day.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M

customer_reviews.title: Way too small, can't return.
customer_reviews.text: Apprears to be a good product however it is way too small as per their size chart, tried to return it to re-order a larger size and they won't take returns, will find a different seller or manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Monte L. Beers

customer_reviews.title: For Hard Workers and Frequent Benders
customer_reviews.text: I work a very long and hard job that requires my back to bend and twist to get to where i need to be due to the small space. I tried chiropractor after masseuse, and after giving up on that, I took the chance and bought this stabilizer. The relief was almost immediate, but the energy i have is triple what I've been dealing with the last 4 months, and the beauty of not feeling any pain in my back in the last 30 minutes of my shift just solidifies that this isn't a waste of time or money, and probably the best way i could accommodate my on the move lifestyle. Thank you BraceUp!
customer_reviews.author: Yan Philipov

customer_reviews.title: Great Support.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best support belt I've ever used, stays snug even while working. I am a 32 waist and the small works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: A product delivered as promised, how refreshing...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brace for multiple reasons. First it is very easy to put on. It also provides a firm but comfortable support for both my abdominal and lower back areas. But what caught my eye in searching for a brace was the word “breathable”. This brace is indeed breathable. I wear this brace over an Under Armor cooling T and under another shirt when working out and I don’t feel any build up of heat whatsoever. That really impressed me after my first use of the brace. I highly recommend this brace...
customer_reviews.author: THE DUKE

product_meta.title: BraceUP Stabilizing Lumbar Lower Back Brace Support Belt Dual Adjustable Straps Breathable Mesh Panels (L/XL)
feature_bullets: Permits full range of movement while providing comfortable support
Dual adjustment straps provide customized fit and compression
Mesh panels release excess heat and moisture
Designed for proper fit to minimize slipping and bunching

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
